html:
355 U.S. 272

78 S.Ct. 331

2 L.Ed.2d 257

Julius E. ROSENGARD et al., appellants,
v.
CITY OF BOSTON et al.

No. 566.

Supreme Court of the United States

December 16, 1957

Mr. Samuel P. Sears, for appellants.

Mr. J. Edward Keefe, Jr., for appellees.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.
